resources.string: This app lets you analyze your personal location history that Google is recording.
Before we can start, we need you to download your personal file from the Google servers. We will guide you through this process.
Click the button below to open the download page. Sign in with your Google account and select \"Location History\" in the \"JSON\" format. Google will notify you once the file is ready to download.
You\'re almost done! Click the button below to import the JSON formatted file you just downloaded. We will take the rest from there.
This might take a few minutes.
